text: Sex or Phaestos or Phaistos () was a town of the Ozolian Locrians, with a port called the port of Apollo Phaestius. The site of Phaestus is tentatively placed at Kisseli Panormos (). ==References== Category:Populated places in Ozolian Locris Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Phaestus (Locris)
